title: Mr. Game and Watch should be a champion
body:
**Passive: Toot Toot**
Mr. Game and Watch toot toots his target into the air when he auto attacks them sometimes. 

**Q: Hammer **
Mr. Game and Watch brings out his hammer and gets a randomly generated value from 1 to 9.  The higher the number the more damage it does.  Getting a 7 restores part of his health, getting an 8 freezes the target for a random number of seconds, and getting a 9 knocks back the target a random distance while doing bonus %max health true damage (a random value is chosen for this).

**W: Bucket**
Mr. Game and Watch can activate this ability to catch enemy projectiles which charges the bucket.  When the bucket is fully charged, Mr. Game and Watch can activate the ability again and does AoE damage in a cone in front of him.  The damage is equal to 100% of the targets maximum health in true damage.

**E: Frying Pan**
Mr. Game and Watch gets his frying pan out and launches food out all over the place.  The ability does damage to the first enemy struck.  This ability has no cooldown and no mana cost.

**Ult: Octopus**
Mr. Game and Watch turns into a badass Octopus and shoots out his tentacles from time to time doing a random amount of true damage to all targets that are hit.
